title: Tensei shitara Slime Datta Ken 2nd Season Part 2
synopsis: The nation of Tempest is in a festive mood after successfully overcoming the surprise attack from the Blumund Army and the Western Holy Church. Beyond the festivities lies a meeting between Tempest and its allies to decide the future of the Nation of Monsters. The aftermath of the Blumund invasion, Milim Nava's suspicious behavior, and the disappearance of Demon Lord Carrionâ€”the problems seem to keep on piling up.
